title: Mobile Troubleshooting - Cannot Receive Calls
description: A customer can make calls but cannot receive any. All incoming calls go straight to voicemail.

tasks.description: Check if the customer has accidentally enabled 'Do Not Disturb' or a similar focus mode on their device.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent guides the customer to check their phone's settings.

tasks.description: Check the account's call forwarding settings for any unconditional forwards.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent discovers an unconditional call forward to voicemail is active on the account.

tasks.description: Disable the unconditional call forwarding on the customer's line.
